ui_browse_grid_no_results:
No wallpapers found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_grid_no_results_generic:
No results found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_body:
You are about to open an external application as a wallpaper:
{{filepath}}
Wallpaper Engine has no control over this file, you must ensure that it comes from a reliable source before proceeding.
ui_editor_review_info_body:
Your wallpaper will be reviewed before other users can find and download it to ensure that it doesn't violate any local laws.

If you update your wallpaper, it has to be reviewed again and is pushed to the back of the queue.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_as: Please choose what kind of assets you would like to share on [[[Host]]]:
Publish as asset pack. Users will be able to import each layer separately.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_la: Select the layers that you would like to share:
There are no eligible layers to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_ef: Select the effect that you would like to share:
There are no eligible effects to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_warn_advanced_assets_creation_:
This option should only be used by advanced users who are familiar with the editor and have published a few Scene wallpapers before.

Enabling this will add buttons to the editor that allow you to create new single assets to be shared on the [[[Host]]] for others to re-use in their own wallpapers.
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_new_e:
You are about to duplicate the effect '{{effect}}' and create a new, editable effect where you can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_delete_effec:
Are you sure that you want to delete the effect '{{effect}}'?

This will break all usages of that effect inside the wallpaper and this cannot be undone!
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_no_ratin: Please make sure that any content you upload is suitable for everyone! If you upload anything questionable or illegal, your submission or your entire account may be banned.
